example.parse: (PUNC ,) (S-ADV (VP (ADJ.VN+CASE_INDEF_ACC مضيفاً) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-3 (NP (NOUN_NUM+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC اربعة)) (PP (PREP مم) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON ن)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP ساعدوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC المهاجمين))))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP اخفوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC السلم)) (NP-LOC (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC تحت) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN شجيرات)) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الجانب) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاسرائيلي)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحدود))))))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: four of those who had aided the attackers had concealed the ladder

example.arg: أن أربعة ممن ساعدوا المهاجمين اخفوا السلم
